New Records: Cole Ragans tied a Royals record by striking out eight batters in a row.
Key Match Events: Cole Ragans struck out 10 batters and allowed only a single and a walk in the first five innings.
Yusei Kikuchi gave up three hits and no walks in the first six innings.
Ben Gamel made a terrific diving play to prevent an RBI single by Bobby Witt Jr.
Yainer Diaz drove in two runs with a groundball.
Jeremy Peña hit a triple to give the Astros a four-run lead.
Garrett Hampson made a leaping catch to rob Yordan Alvarez of a home run.
Bobby Witt Jr. hit a home run in the top of the eighth inning.
Post-Match Reflections: The Royals are still holding the second Wild Card spot, four games clear of a playoff spot.
The Royals' Magic Number is now 22.
The Royals will have reinforcements tomorrow, adding Tommy Pham, Robbie Grossman, and Yuli Gurriel to the lineup.
